entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning early this evening and ending overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Fog patches. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023
